s0: ^I don't believe it... Things are playing out exactly the same way they did last time.

c: ^[Charlotte]	"I am glad to hear it. I’ve heard it rumored that you are to seek your fortunes outside the House soon."
^] "Yeah, end of the week. I think I'm ready."
^[Charlotte] "Yes, you’ll do very well out there. Society loves a smile, my dear."
^"Where are my manners? You must properly introduce this new face."
^] "Great. I'm still in one piece, at least."
^[Charlotte] "I see. Perhaps the rumors were a fabrication."
^"I heard that you are due to be released at week’s end… and yet your language lacks the tone of aplomb I have come to expect from those moving on to greener pastures."
^] "No, it's true. I am super 'due'. Guess I'm just still coming to terms with it."
^. I am certain you will find your confidence by the time you leave us."
^"Where are my manners? You must properly introduce this new face."
^] "Just great. Nothing beats wasting my life in a box with a bunch of fellow crazies."
^[Charlotte] "Mind your manners! I’ve heard it rumored that you are to rejoin polite society soon. Such churlish elocution will do you no favors there."
^] "Sorry, Charlotte. I'm just frustrated is all."
^[Charlotte] "How hypocritical of me. Here I am lecturing you on manners, meanwhile failing to request an introduction to your associate."
^] "I am doing well, thank you. And how are you? As well as you look, I hope."
^[Charlotte] "When did you acquire such charm? I must say it is a special joy to find a kindred spirit with whom I may hold a proper conversation!"
^"Oh dear, that sounded terribly callous, didn’t it? Your eloquence may have caught me off-guard,
^"Please do not think I hold those without formal dialectical training in any sort of contempt."

Introduce_Timothy: ^"Charlotte, this is Timothy Miyuri, my new roommate. Timothy, this is Charlotte Blackwell. She's... uh, she lives here, too."
Formal_Introduce_Timothy: ^] "Before we continue, let me introduce my roommate Timothy Miyuri."
^] "Charlotte, this is my new roommate Timothy Miyuri."
^Timothy peeks out from his hiding place in the shadows behind me.
^] "Timothy, this is my fellow resident Charlotte Blackwell. She's a top-class orator. Always knows the right thing to say."
^[Charlotte] "You flatterer! You seem to have dipped your tongue in silver since we last spoke,

b: ^Wait, but... she's the one who taught me this stuff.
^If this hasn't happened before, how do I know all this? But if it has, why does no one remember?!
^It's weird to think that the last time she spoke with me is different from the last time I spoke with her.

Trissa: ^[Charlotte] "It is a pleasure to meet you, Timothy. Welcome to our home."
^[Charlotte] "My roommate is here, too. Doubtless she'll be overjoyed to make your acquaintance."
^I get an uncharacteristic hint of annoyance from Charlotte as she beckons to her.
^"Trissa, dear, come and meet the new arrival!"
^[Trissa] "Hiya! What's goin on, Lotty? You say somethin' about a new arrival?"
^[Trissa] "Oh, right! I remember now. You're the
^"When Max introduced you, you were wearing that shirt with the polar bear on it."

s1: ^I don't even really like polar bears.

Trissa: ^[Trissa] "Then you must be the new guy! You can call me Trissa!"
^[Trissa] "No need to act so scared, my man. I don't bite! Not often, anyway..."
^Timothy looks like he might not believe her.
^[Trissa] "I'm joking, of course! You and me are gonna be tight compadres, wait and see."
^"Just take it easy your first week. You'll find your rhythm."
^Trissa turns to look at me and lowers her voice to speak privately.
^[Trissa] "You take care of this one, alright? Let's make sure to give Timothy a good home."
^"Anyways, I gotta run. Take care y'all!"
^[Charlotte] "It would be wise for me to take my leave as well."
^[Charlotte] "I am very pleased to have made your acquaintance, Timothy. It was nice to see you as well,
NoTimothy: ^] "Oh yeah, have you met my new roommate Timothy yet?"
^[Charlotte] "Yes, indeed I have. Not long ago, in fact, in the company of our charming resident assistant."
^"He seems like quite a timid fellow, your roommate. You will take care of him, won't you?"
^[Charlotte] "Good. Anyway, I'm always happy to show off the library to newcomers!"
^The way she talks, you'd think she was the librarian.

b: ^I guess she kind of is, if what I remember is real.

NoTimothy: ^"Only, they spent very little time here. I barely had time to explain the notes to Timothy before Max whisked him away."
^Trissa chimes in from the corner of the room, having apparently been listening in to our conversation.
^[Trissa] "Hey, I'm sure you'll have plenty of time to explain everything to him once he's settled."
^"Max probably just didn't want you to stress him out with all your rules!"
^Trissa stands up straight and puts on her best impression of Max.
^"Welcome to Sunflower House! This is the library."
^"Make sure not to leave a book open face down or the spine will crack and blondie here will kill you in your sleep!"
^"Although... I can't say I haven't been upset about how some residents care for their books. Or rather do not."
^[Trissa] "Take it easy, I'm just messin' wichu."
^, I think I'm next on her list! I'd better get outta here."
^Trissa strides out of the room with her arms up in a mock sprint, laughing the whole way.
^Charlotte exhales gently and her demeanor relaxes considerably.
^[Charlotte] "I think I had best find something else to do. Farewell,
^"It's nice to see you out and about for a change!"
^I don't have any reason to be in here either. I wait a minute so it doesn't seem like I'm following her and then walk out of the room.
